action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

That's great! Looks really good. Thanks.

One minor change please…my mistake…can we change the blue headings of each text:

  1. From 'Bluewater provides single sign-on (SSO) capability' to 'Single Sign-On (SSO)'

  2. From 'Bluewater's ServiceNow connector' to 'ServiceNow connector'



Also, once this is done, please can you add 'Technical' to the drop down menu under 'Resources' in the top navigation bar, after 'Case studies' .

Many thanks

Best

Justin

full_threads.body:
Great thanks Heath.

The work I want done is on the 'Technical' page section you set up for me previously, which will appear as a sub section of the 'resources' menu on the top navigation bar.

You kindly used the 'Blog' template for creating this page. In between time we have decided to drastically simplify this page structure. The attached document describes what we want. The comments in red are guidance, while all the text in black & blue are the actual texts to be used

Should you have any questions, please let me know.

Thanks
